movies.title: Not Only Mrs. Raut
movies.plot: A homeless bedraggled woman, wondering around the Juhu Beach area of Bombay, clutching a bag, shuffles over to a small restaurant and orders some food. She eats like she has been starving and hasn't eaten for days. When she finishes her meal, she gets up to leave, only to be stopped by the waiter, who asks her to pay her bill. She says she has no money, and the waiter severely beats and kicks her and only stops after she starts screaming loudly in pain. The next day, she goes to the Juhu Police Station, gives a statement that she has killed a man near the beach area with a dagger, the evidence being a bloodied dagger from her bag and places it before the Police Inspector. She is asked to make a statement and held in a cell. Her name is Vidya Raut and she has killed her former employer, Raghuvir Karkhanis. Advocate Swati A. Dandavate decides to defend her, not realizing that the Public Prosecutor in this case is none other than her husband, Aditya Vishnu Dandavate, the brother of the ...
movies.simplePlot: Aditya Dandavate is not the public prosecutor in this case, instead he was Raghuvir Karkhanis's lawyer in a previous rape case.

biography.bio: Tushar Dalvi is an actor, known for Madaari (2016), Devrai (2004) and Mrugjal... Ek Naslela Astitva (2000).
biography.name: Tushar Dalvi

biography.bio: Aditi Deshpande is an actress and producer, known for Not Only Mrs. Raut (2003), Pak Pak Pakaak (2005) and Vazandar: Biggie (2016).
biography.name: Aditi Deshpande

biography.bio: Vikram Gokhale is an actor and director, known for Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam (1999), Bang Bang (2014) and Hey Ram (2000).
biography.name: Vikram Gokhale

biography.bio: Kaushal Inamdar was born on October 2, 1971 in Mumbai, India. He is a composer and actor, known for Sound of Heaven: The Story of Balgandharva (2011), Yellow (2014) and Not Only Mrs. Raut (2003).
biography.name: Kaushal Inamdar

biography.placeOfBirth: Bangalore, Kingdom of Mysore, British India
biography.bio: Mohan Joshi was born on September 4, 1945 in Bangalore, Kingdom of Mysore, British India. He is an actor, known for Gangaajal (2003), Vaastav: The Reality (1999) and Ishq (1997).
biography.name: Mohan Joshi

biography.bio: Ketaki Karadekar is an actress, known for Not Only Mrs. Raut (2003).
biography.name: Ketaki Karadekar

biography.bio: Ravindra Mankani is an actor, known for Astitva (2000), Khakee (2004) and M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story (2016).
biography.name: Ravindra Mankani

biography.bio: Milind Shah is known for his work on Ultrachrist! (2003) and Not Only Mrs. Raut (2003).
biography.name: Milind Shah

biography.bio: Madhura Velankar is an actress, known for Matichya Chuli (2006), Jajantaram Mamantaram (2003) and Not Only Mrs. Raut (2003).
biography.name: Madhura Velankar
